#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int Count, CountOfPoints;
    vector<double> wyniks;
    vector<int> points;

    vector<int> x;
    vector<int> y;

    cin >> Count;

    for(int i =0; i<Count; i++)
    {
            cin >> CountOfPoints;

            int temp;

            for(int i =0; i < CountOfPoints; i++)
            {
                cin >> temp;
                points.push_back(temp);
            }

            points.push_back(points[0]);

            for(int i =0; i< CountOfPoints; i++)
            {
                cin >> temp;
                points.push_back(temp);
            }

            points.push_back(points[CountOfPoints+1]);

            double S = 0;

            for(int i =0; i<CountOfPoints; i++)
            {

                S += ((points[i+1] + points[i])*(points[CountOfPoints+1+i] - points[CountOfPoints+i+2]));

            }

            wyniks.push_back(abs(S/2));
            points.clear();

    }

    for(int i =0; i<Count; i++)
        printf ("%.1f\n", wyniks[i]);

    return 0;
}
